task.title: Running a Quick Search
task.shortdesc: Quick searches provide a fast way to find items in a library or collection.

context.p: Quick searching is the fastest way to locate an item in your library. When running a quick search, the search will likely return multiple semi-specific results.

step.cmd: Click inside of the search box at the top right of the center pane

taskbody.result: As you type, only those items in the center column that match the search terms will remain.
